divs: sighting detailsgeographic facts: spottet on hausen am albis, switzerland 47��� 15' n. br. 8��� 32' ���. l. (source: wikipedia.de ; http:\\de.wikipedia.org\wiki\hausen_am_albis ) looking to the airsports end. ########################################################################### hello, [~17:19] i was at my window of my house and looked out of my window. it rained, but it was a realy special rain-day, because the clouds and the lighting conditions are very nice \ butefull. so i want to make a picture out of my window with my mobile phone. [~17:00] befor, i was in my house and making some pictures in the house. but my handy doesnt save the pictures dont know why. but i think that not realy have to do with a ufo or something. [~17:18] after, i see a round little point (little because the mobile phone screen isnt big) wich looks like a silver or gray, from older times, like from the 1960s or older or somthing (if you know the story about german world war 2 ufos, like this color http:\\www.nrg.co.il\images\archive\408x322\577\086.jpg). the object not realy shone (not "bling bling"). i see the object only with my handy camera. i cant see it with my eye (i readet about the phenomen). i was shot a picture but my handy doesnt save it, dont know why but i think that not realy have to do with a ufo or something. [~17:20] restartet my mobile phone. with some startup problems because the start button sucks or something. [17:23] shot the first picture. dsc00371.jpg [17:23] shot the second picture. dsc00372.jpg the "ufo" were littler, think it "fly" away (think the sky were a lil bit darker <- my sun reflaction therory) [17:23] shot the last picture. dsc00373.jpg all in one, the "ufo" dont moved higher \ lower. i dont heard what from the "ufo". it was a "fix" point in the sky. i dont think that that is a ufo, i think thats a sun-reflection to my handy camera. so, whats strange if you look at the first picture you see a "star" or sun-"star"-reflection. mayby a alien moves arround or something :) or engine "smoke" or "rader scanner" or something. i say again, i dont think that that a ufo is, i want send you the pictures because i think thats just a sun-reflaction and i want help u to filter out fakes or those sight phenomens. i have the orginal fotos on my mobile-phone (no worry about fakes or something :)). ################# if you have questions about the "signt" or some geographic things, just ask me, i like storys about ufos, aliens, stuff like this. i hope i helped you all, and sorry for my bad english. please contact me want to know what you think about, pascal g. warrick@gmx.ch (secondary email)
